actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT list_expense.list_expense_id , list_expense.list_type_id ,
list_expense.event_history_id , list_expense.name , list_expense.list_expense_amount , list_expense."calculate_type (1 = split, 2 = individual)" ,

event_history.event_history_id as event_history_id_from_event 

FROM list_expense 
inner join event_history on event_history.event_history_id = list_expense.event_history_id

WHERE "calculate_type (1 = split, 2 = individual)" = 2 and event_trip_id = {{Select1.selectedOptionValue}}
